page.title: 03Tamsin's Saturday
page.content: Hooray! It was Saturday again. I woke up,cheerful after a good night's sleep. I had slept with Katy the night before. We sat in our beds telling jokes to each other .We went down stairs and watched television.I had some toast. We got dressed. I wore my jogging suit and Katy wore hers.Katy and I went round to my house to ask my mum if I could go down to the Recreation Centre because I was going to watch her at Karate and then go swimming. Mum said yes but we had to go and get a paper from the shop first. At the Centre I waited for Katy to change, watched her do Karate and then went swimming.After dressing, I went in the cafe and had a "Slush Puppy".On the way home we had some food. After a play in the field, we went to my nan's, in Southampton for tea and later, straight home to bed.
